title: Identity Cyber Scores: The New Metric Shaping Cyber Insurance in 2026
description: With one in three cyber-attacks now involving compromised employee accounts, insurers and regulators are placing far greater emphasis on identity posture when assessing cyber risk.  For many organizations, however, these assessments remain largely opaque.
